title: We do not involve in scams, because...
comments:
Do you not see the difference? The money govt was asking for was for its expenditure.

Also, the money it was asking for doesn't belong to RBI. This is a better explainer: https://www.capitalmind.in/2018/12/abeyaar-rbi-is-hoarding-too-much-capital-and-can-pay-a-chunk-to-the-government/

Ever wonder how legit information sources are behind paywalls, and bakwaas misinformation websites are free to everyone 

Funny how that works
Worst article written by an asshole.. RBI isn't country's enemy.. it's main objective is to protect nation's wealth and maintain financial stability..
Lol. Imagine thinking election expenditure is something RBI should give.
cleaned_comments: see difference money govt asking expenditure also money asking doesnt belong rbi better explainer ever wonder legit information sources behind paywalls bakwaas misinformation websites free everyone funny works worst article written asshole rbi isnt countrys enemy main objective protect nations wealth maintain financial stability lol imagine thinking election expenditure something rbi give
